revised_title: Anomalous Magnetic Action of Hot Iron: Discovering the Transition from Negative to Positive Attraction
tldr: This article describes experiments conducted by Peter Barlow on the magnetic properties of hot iron. He discovered an anomalous behavior where iron exhibits negative attraction to the compass needle at the red heat before transitioning to positive attraction at the white heat. This finding helps to reconcile previous contradictory statements about the magnetic properties of heated iron.
